trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sellersburg
There was one other sighting in Sellersburg on or around July 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsa couple of days ago i reported and sent a video in on my july 3rd sighting titled: "really bright orange\ red orb" on july 4th i had a friend over. i had told her about what i had saw the night before and showed her the video. we both were sitting outside and she is the one that actually pointed this out and said "is that one of those things?" i had my canon digital camera again and took a video of it. i apologize it automatically loads up in quicktime and takes a really long time to load up but i do not know how to change it myself. i wasn't going to share this one because i didn't want it to take away from my other report on the july 3rd event. this time it was a little further away and moving alot faster. this one didn't hover it just flew in a path. i wasn't sure it was the same thing but it does look like it.
